body:
I was trying to build OpenMPI with clang-5.0.0 (installed from homebrew) on OS X and spack complained that it could not find m4, autoconf, automake, or libtool.  I solved this locally, by adding

  depends_on('m4')
    depends_on('autoconf')
    depends_on('automake')
    depends_on('libtool')

but I don't think that I should have.  It seems like the spack environment should have implicitly added these dependencies for AutotoolsPackages.
title: AutotoolsPackage Openmpi with clang on os x
